dict.acceptation: 注意，注意力；照料，关怀；殷勤；

sent.orig: ADI DA SAMRAJ: That is a physical representation of the nature of attention.
sent.trans: 阿谛达至尊：那是注意力(attention)的性质展现在物质层面。

sent.orig: This fundamental torque that's in attention.
sent.trans: 这是注意力(attention)的基本扭矩(torque)。

sent.orig: People pay more attention to Yinhaiguang's thinkings, but pay little attention to his method of thinking.
sent.trans: 人们对殷海光的思想研究比较多，对他的思维方法，关注却不够。其实殷海光的思维方法是很有特色的。

sent.orig: Given more attention(If they had been given more attention), the cabbages could have grown better.
sent.trans: 如果施以更细心的照料，这些大白菜还可以长得更好。

sent.orig: But you can't get beyond the knot, the torque inherent in attention, or feel?ing attention itself.
sent.trans: 但是你不能超出这缠结，这注意力本俱的扭矩，或感觉注意力(feelingattention)本身。
